title: Minecraft Pocket Edition (v0.11 build 13)
description:
== About the game:
Minecraft is about placing blocks to build things and going on adventures!
Pocket Edition includes randomly generated worlds, multiplayer over a local Wi-Fi network, and Survival and Creative modes. You can craft and create with your friends anywhere in the world so long as you have hands spare and battery to burn.
Our most recent update added the iconic Creepers. TheyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re big, green, mean and explody. But itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s just one of many. Since Minecraft Ã¢â‚¬â€ Pocket Edition first appeared, weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re continuing to add loads of new features, including...


== Features:
- Food! Now you can cook and go hungry
- Swords! Bows! TNT! - Chests - Skeletons - Spiders - Beds - Paintings - Lots more!


== Version:
Minecraft Pocket Edition Alpha 0.11.0 build 13, from May 22, 2015
Full Release


== Version changes:
Changes:
Added all tools to the creative inventory

Fixes:
9 bugs fixed

Fixed crash on loading chunks too early
Fixed crash when creating certain entities
Fixed various language related issues
Fixed lighting with entities outside of world bounds

From the 0.11.0 beta:

MCPE-8518 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Casting the fishing rod into water crashes the game immediately
MCPE-8525 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Fishing in a boat crashes the game


== Instructions:
1. Copy .apk file to your Android 
Run and install it
Play & enjoy!


== System Requirements:
Android 4.0+
